column1: in memory of ray thaddius webb -- evans funeral service| ray thaddius webb. june 9
column3: 2015 biography. mr. ray buster thaddius webb
column7: 2015 at caldwell unc health care in lenoir. born july 13
column9: mr. webb was a son of the late flim ray and christine crawford webb and the husband of teresa beane webb
column10: of the home to whom he had shared 45 years of marriage. other than his parents
column11: he was preceded in death by a brother
column12: allen webb. buster was a self-employed painter and loved hunting and fishing. he was a member of first baptist church-whitnel. he will best be remembered for the love he had for his family. he had served in the us army during vietnam as a sharp shooter and received the purple heart. surviving other than his wife are three sons
column16: faye combs and husband vernon and betty jean tolbert and husband david
column17: all of lenoir and six grandchildren
column22: izaiah and kaitlyn. he is also survived by several nieces
column23: nephews and other relatives. a celebration of busters life will be held 2:00 pm friday
column25: 2015 in the chapel of evans funeral service with reverend stuart white officiating followed by military honors provided by the nc national guard and the caldwell county veterans honor guard. the family will receive friends from 1:00 until 2:00 pm
column26: one hour prior to the service. in lieu of flowers
column27: the family requests memorials be made to the caldwell county veterans honor guard
column30: nc 28638. online condolences may be sent to the webb family at www. evansfuneralservice. comevans funeral service & crematory is serving the webb family.
